00001 #include "ros/ros.h"
00002 #include "last_letter/calc_torque.h"
00003 #include "last_letter/calc_air_data.h"
00004 #include "last_letter/c_lift_a.h"
00005 #include "last_letter/c_drag_a.h"
00006 #include "nav_msgs/Odometry.h"
00007 #include "geometry_msgs/Vector3.h"
00008 #include "geometry_msgs/Quaternion.h"
00009 #include "tf/transform_datatypes.h"
00010 //#include "LinearMath/btMatrix3x3.h"
00011 #include <cstdlib>
00012 #include <math.h>
00013 
00014 ros::ServiceClient airDataClient, liftClient, dragClient;
00015 
00016 bool calc_torque_callback(last_letter::calc_torque::Request &req, last_letter::calc_torque::Response &res)
00017 {
00018 
00019         //initializing inputs           
00020         nav_msgs::Odometry states = req.states;
00021         double inputs[4];
00022         inputs[0] = req.inputs[0];
00023         inputs[1] = req.inputs[1];
00024         inputs[2] = req.inputs[2];
00025         inputs[3] = req.inputs[3];
00026         
00027         //request air data from getAirData server
00028         last_letter::calc_air_data airDataService;
00029         airDataService.request.speeds = req.states.twist.twist.linear;
00030         if (!airDataClient.call(airDataService)){
00031                 ROS_ERROR("Failed to call service calc_air_data in %s","torque_server");
00032         }
00033         double airspeed = airDataService.response.airspeed;
00034         double alpha = airDataService.response.alpha;
00035         double beta = airDataService.response.beta;
00036         
00037         //split control input values
00038         double deltaa = inputs[0];
00039         double deltae = inputs[1];
00040         double deltat = inputs[2];
00041         double deltar = inputs[3];
00042         
00043         //request lift and drag alpha-coefficients from the corresponding server
00044         last_letter::c_lift_a liftService;
00045         liftService.request.alpha = alpha;
00046         if (!liftClient.call(liftService)){
00047                 ROS_ERROR("Failed to call service c_lift_a in %s","torque_server");
00048         }
00049         double c_lift_a = liftService.response.c_lift_a;
00050         
00051         last_letter::c_drag_a dragService;
00052         dragService.request.alpha = alpha;
00053         if (!dragClient.call(dragService)){
00054                 ROS_ERROR("Failed to call service c_drag_a in %s","torque_server");
00055         }       
00056         double c_drag_a = dragService.response.c_drag_a;
00057 
00058         //read from parameter server
00059         double rho;
00060         double c,b,s;
00061         double c_l_0, c_l_b, c_l_p, c_l_r, c_l_deltaa, c_l_deltar;
00062         double c_m_0, c_m_a, c_m_q, c_m_deltae;
00063         double c_n_0, c_n_b, c_n_p, c_n_r, c_n_deltaa, c_n_deltar;
00064         double k_t_p, k_omega;
00065         
00066         ros::param::getCached("/world/rho",rho);
00067         ros::param::getCached("/airframe/c",c);
00068         ros::param::getCached("/airframe/b",b);
00069         ros::param::getCached("/airframe/s",s); 
00070         ros::param::getCached("/airframe/c_l_0",c_l_0);
00071         ros::param::getCached("/airframe/c_l_b",c_l_b);
00072         ros::param::getCached("/airframe/c_l_p",c_l_p);
00073         ros::param::getCached("/airframe/c_l_r",c_l_r);
00074         ros::param::getCached("/airframe/c_l_deltaa",c_l_deltaa);
00075         ros::param::getCached("/airframe/c_l_deltar",c_l_deltar);
00076         ros::param::getCached("/airframe/c_m_0",c_m_0);
00077         ros::param::getCached("/airframe/c_m_a",c_m_a);
00078         ros::param::getCached("/airframe/c_m_q",c_m_q);
00079         ros::param::getCached("/airframe/c_m_deltae",c_m_deltae);
00080         ros::param::getCached("/airframe/c_n_0",c_n_0);
00081         ros::param::getCached("/airframe/c_n_b",c_n_b);
00082         ros::param::getCached("/airframe/c_n_p",c_n_p);
00083         ros::param::getCached("/airframe/c_n_r",c_n_r);
00084         ros::param::getCached("/airframe/c_n_deltaa",c_n_deltaa);
00085         ros::param::getCached("/airframe/c_n_deltar",c_n_deltar);
00086         ros::param::getCached("/motor/k_t_p",k_t_p);
00087         ros::param::getCached("/motor/k_omega",k_omega);
00088         
00089         //read angular rates
00090         double p = states.twist.twist.angular.x;
00091         double q = states.twist.twist.angular.y;
00092         double r = states.twist.twist.angular.z;
00093         
00094         //calculate aerodynamic torque
00095         double qbar = 1.0/2.0*rho*pow(airspeed,2)*s; //Calculate dynamic pressure
00096         double la, na, ma;
00097         if (airspeed==0)
00098         {
00099                 la = 0;
00100                 ma = 0;
00101                 na = 0;
00102         }
00103         else
00104         {
00105                 la = qbar*b*(c_l_0 + c_l_b*beta + c_l_p*b*p/(2*airspeed) + c_l_r*b*r/(2*airspeed) + c_l_deltaa*deltaa + c_l_deltar*deltar);
00106                 ma = qbar*c*(c_m_0 + c_m_a*alpha + c_m_q*c*q/(2*airspeed) + c_m_deltae*deltae);
00107                 na = qbar*b*(c_n_0 + c_n_b*beta + c_n_p*b*p/(2*airspeed) + c_n_r*b*r/(2*airspeed) + c_n_deltaa*deltaa + c_n_deltar*deltar);
00108         }
00109         
00110         //calculate thrust torque
00111         double lm = -k_t_p*pow(k_omega*deltat,2);
00112         double mm = 0;
00113         double nm = 0;
00114         
00115         //Sum torques
00116         double l = la + lm;
00117         double m = ma + mm;
00118         double n = na + nm;
00119         
00120         res.torque.x = l;
00121         res.torque.y = m;
00122         res.torque.z = n;
00123         
00124         return true;
00125 }
00126 
00127 int main(int argc, char **argv)
00128 {
00129         ros::init(argc, argv, "calc_torque_server");
00130         ros::NodeHandle n;
00131 
00132         ros::ServiceServer service = n.advertiseService("calc_torque",calc_torque_callback);
00133         airDataClient = n.serviceClient<last_letter::calc_air_data>("calc_air_data");
00134         liftClient = n.serviceClient<last_letter::c_lift_a>("c_lift_a");        
00135         dragClient = n.serviceClient<last_letter::c_drag_a>("c_drag_a");        
00136         ROS_INFO("calc_torque_server ready");
00137         ros::spin();
00138 
00139         return 0;
00140 }
